but have you ever wondered, what if megamind gave himself metroman's powers ???
(part 1/6) - rebirth
"be not afraid," said megamind calmly. as he rose up in the sky, he felt every vibration of every molecule. his super senses made him see the world like never before. his huge brain lets him utilize the powers more optimally than metroman ever could.
as he stood there, sharpening his senses, something struck him. "what the fuck?" - megamind gasped, as he thought he heard a familiar voice through his super-hearing. focusing his super-eyesight in the direction, he saw a figure resembling metroman, doing a concert on stage. "this could not be... unless..." - megamind was suspicious at first. but then, he noticed his superhuman fingers hitting the notes on that guitar that no human ever could. there is no doubt now. it was him. "metrooomaaan!!" - he screamed as he flew towards him. in a blink of an eye, he punched through and carried him straight, like a raging bullet. metroman was now pinned against the moon.
"how could you do this to me, leave me all alone? for this circus!?" - megamind whispered aggressively as a tear fell down his eye. - "megamin... what... have you done? i'm sorry, but..."; megamind interrupted him with a crazed laughter: " we... are equals now... no, no, no!!... i... am... the... god now."
in a blink of an eye, megamind turned around and punched metroman with the force of a thousand suns, straight through the moon. metroman recollected himself, and took a defensive stance: "let's talk" - he said, as for the first time in his entire life, a drop of blood poured down his nose.
--- part's 2,3,4,5,6 are on my community posts here on youtube ---

*since you look young, let me give you some advice.* it's hard to reach the "about" page of your channel and, even when i do, there's no email on it. without an email, there's no way to link to you for doing business.
your video descriptions also lack contact information, and this may make you miss out on business opportunities.
